features: 【Safety Certification】Our kids water bottle have been certified by a third-party organization, free of BPA, lead, PAES. Children drink water every day, a healthy water bottle is very important to them. This high-quality stainless steel water bottle is definitely the best growth gift for children!

【DESIGNED FOR LITTLE HANDS】: We specially designed this small 9 oz water bottle for young children, which can be easily grasped by kid's little hands. The compact water bottle fits in a lunch box. Plus, the bottle comes with a hand strap to help kids carry around and stay hydrated throughout the day!

【Durable Leak-Proof Lid】: The threaded design on the lid increases grip and can be easily opened with wet hands, helping young children to drink independently. The stainless steel cover is strong enough to withstand frequent drops, and there is no need to worry about breakage and frequent parts replacement. The lid is 100% leak-proof and allows the water bottle to be put in the bag.

【Insulation upgrade】: Double vacuum insulation, keeping water cool to the greatest extent. Children can drink water at the right temperature at all times, thus motivating them to drink water. The KOODEE kids water bottle has been tested to keep cold drinks warm for 24 hours and hot drinks for 12 hours.

【Colorful Appearance】: Powder coating is the pinnacle of water bottle exteriors. The water bottle always maintains a bright look without fading or falling off. The vacuum technology makes the water bottle sweat-free, so even if the cup is filled with hot water, it won't feel hot.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Carry Strap Kids need a portable water bottle to help them stay hydrated on the go. A sturdy nylon lanyard helps them get around, whether it's camping or a graduation trip, KOODEE is always the best way to help your child drink water! Easy Grip We have carefully designed this water bottle for children aged 3-12. The small bottle fits your child's small hands, and the powder coating provides a comfortable grip. A good drinking experience helps children be more proactive and hydrated. Narrow Mouth This bottle is perfect for carrying in a backpack, and the 100% leak-proof protection ensures that your backpack stays dry. It is an excellent choice for children's outdoor hydration.

What I want to say to all parents You are an amazing mom/dad because you have raised smart and lovely offspring. From kids to learning to speak , you accompany your child to grow up and experience every moment of the child’s growth. I know that you have paid a great sacrifice and patience. Just want to say, how great you are! Our products are designed for kids. I have a 5-year-old daughter, and I know that for parents, children are more important than anything in the world. So we will never cut corners on security. Kid in the early childhood stage are curious about the world, and the colorful colors will attract their attention. But for children who are in school, this will distract them from a lot of attention during class. So, when designing the appearance color of the water bottle, we have reduced the use of gaudy color. As a professional water bottle manufacturer (and also a mother), I know what your child needs. Whether you are browsing or choosing to order a set of cups, we appreciate your willingness to try.

12 oz kids water bottle with straw 12 oz kids water bottle 16 oz kids water bottle with straw 16 oz kids water bottle 17 oz stainless steel water bottle Capacity 12 oz 12 oz 16 oz 16 oz 17 oz Leak Proof ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Fits Cup Holders ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek & perfect suze
reviews.reviewText: Many are looking for the 40oz cups these days, but that does always work for travel. The smaller refillable water bottle fits easily in my car cup holder as well as the side pocket on my backpack I take when traveling. The top seals completely and doesn’t leak. With smaller hands I can easily hold. Keeps drinks cold.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars fits great in backpacks and is easy to carry around
reviews.reviewText: this little guy does the job! i carried it around using the handle for weeks and it held up well. it keeps water cold, is easy to wash and is the perfect size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size, keeps things cold or hot for a long time! I was surprised to find my tea still warm after hours sitting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very sleek and seems durable
reviews.reviewText: I'll be using this bottle for myself (an actual grown-up). I wanted a smallish bottle for a travel tour I'm going on. It's a lovely bottle, but the vacuum/thermos part makes it heavier than I would prefer. When I add water to it, I'm afraid it will be heavier than I want. I'm going to keep it, though, as I can use it when I'm not trekking! I gave it four stars because of the weight. It's about as heavy without liquid as my small stainless steel bottle that I've owned for years is with water. Also, the cord around the neck is actual fabric which pretty much makes it impossible to wash and dry. The ring around the neck is plastic with a small loop. I cut off the fabric cord and attached a round metal key ring on the loop to make it easier to carry. A nice feature is that the lid covers the entire lip of the bottle, keeping it clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps things cools extended time frame. Fill half full mini nugget ice to extend cool time.
reviews.reviewText: And it keeps things at the temperature you put it into it for very long time...It's worth the money I spent...I got different colors for differentI like to put my custom blackberry Sodastream into it. It holds the exact amount the sodastream carbonates.Then if I'm really careful I can just get it into this container and the lid in.I can take several with me to my family's house and drink my prepared all natural blackberry soda just like everyone else drinks soft drinks and beers. But the metal container is sturdy enough for the carbonated water from the sodastream.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've been looking for a good water bottle that wasn't ridiculously large. How much water do you need on a 1-2mile walk?! This is perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality material
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I got a stainless steel bottle, and the metal quality is excellent. It's tasteless, rust-free for a long time, and effectively maintains temperature. Easy to clean, overall a great purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little water bottle
reviews.reviewText: I don't need lots of water. This little bottle served my needs just fine.

Siempre he sido fan de este tipo de botellas, y todas las que he tenido ahora las considero regulares, primero me encantaron los colores de esta marca, segundo, el tamaño perfecto para mi café, pero lo mejor es que mantiene mi café muy caliente por varias horas, lo descubrí porque me di una quemada de lengua jajaja, casi dos horas después de haberlo puesto en la botella, estaba tan acostumbrada que ya estaba tibio o casi frio, en fin, producto 100% recomendado.

reviews.reviewerName: I like it and I put it in my bathroom
reviews.reviewTitle: It’s good for my son to his school
reviews.reviewText: I like it and very nice

Me ha gustado mucho, el diseño es bonito de tamaño adecuado para cargar en el bolso, ya lo probe con temperaturas frio - calor manteniendo frio y caliente, y claro que funcionan bastante bien me ha dado hasta 12 hrs de buena temperatura claro no igual a la de inicio caliente o helado, pero si tibio o frio. Respecto a ser hermético, es completamente antiderrames lo he usado todo el tiempo desde que llego dentro y fuera de casa.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sterne stehen für die Preisbildung. Die Flasche ist gut, aber was ist mit dem Preis geworden?!
reviews.reviewText: Eine sehr schöne und gute Flasche. Aber was ist zur Hölle mit dem Preis geworden?Ich habe mir diese Flasche im April 2023 bestellt. Jetzt ist Oktober 2023. Der Preis ist um mehr als 100% gestiegen.Ich wollte mir eine andere Flasche (mit Strohhalm) von Koodee kaufen. Sorry, 45 Euro für eine Flasche ist echt übertrieben.
